text.section: Each district is a public corporate body that exercises public and essential government functions, for the public health and welfare.

As to any project, each district may do any of the following:
Acquire the project.
Construct the project.
Hold the project.
Improve the project.
Lease the project as a lessee or lessor.
Maintain the project.
Operate the project.
Own the project.
Reconstruct the project.
Repair the project.
